oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Generating spacetimes of zero gravitational mass
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: DADHICH, N
NARAYAN, K
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: string-dominated universe
global texture
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: We propose a geometric restriction on Euclidean/Minkowski distance in the embedding space being proportional to distance in the embedded space, to generate spacetimes with vanishing gravitational mass (R(ik)u(i)u(k) = 0, u(i)u(i) = 1). They are in fact dual-flat. This is also the condition that characterizes global monopoles and textures.
